title: 2 Bedroom, Split Layout, Walk-In Closets, In Unit W/D!
posting_body: * Please note that all rates listed are based on 12 month lease terms which could include 10 weeks free, $1000-$2700 look and lease, and additional discounts.
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 913 Sq.
Alice House is a new, boutique apartment community in Oakland, CA thoughtfully designed for simplicity and comfort.
Floor to ceiling windows, walk-in closets and open floor plans create a relaxing oasis inside every unit.
Work out in our fitness room and recharge with the view from our rooftop deck.
When you’re ready to rejoin the world, Uptown nightlife, Chinatown shops and Lake Merritt trails are all just a short walk away.
Come check out our calming retreat in the center of the city

Dual LED lighting on toilet seat, Central Air Conditioning & Heating, Stainless Steel Appliances, Privacy Blinds, Hardwood-style Flooring, Open Floorplans, Full-size Washer & Dryer, Tile Backsplash, Oversized Windows, Walk-in Closets with Customizable Shelving

Rooftop Terrace with Skyline Views, Pet Wash Station, Clubroom with Coffee Counter, Bike Parking, Package Locker System with Cold Storage, Barbeque Grills, Outdoor TV, Hammock Park, 24-Hour Fitness Center, WiFi Enabled Range, Co-working Lounge, Controlled Access Community, Latch Smart Lock Entry Doors, Tenant Storage, Dry Cleaning Lockers, High-Speed WiFi, EcoBee Thermostats, Fire Pits
